_header: Sin destroyeth his freedom and putteth him into foul servage
_description: On the effects of sin — three lines, monorhyming

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Synnedestroyith his fredom & puttith him in to foul
                    seruageTrawalyth him gretlych & forbedyth him his avantagemakyth
                    god his enmye & revyth hym of his erytage
